title: Emails: Adding a Social Follow Block
body:
Emails: Adding a Social Follow Block¶

The Social Follow block allows you to add customizable links that enable the email recipient to follow the social media accounts linked to the sender.
Note that the default links connect to the social media platform, not your account. Clear the default URL and paste the URL of your personal account instead.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the email design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place a Social Follow block in your email where desired

  2. By default, FaceBook, Twitter, and a customizable link for your website will be linked

    • You also have the option to provide a link to your account on Instagram, LinkedIn, Medium, Pinterest, Snapchat, Vimeo, and YouTube

  3. Click Add Service and select a social media platform to add an additional link to your block

  4. Click the to delete a link

  5. If desired, replace the default texts

  6. If desired, change the properties of the social follow links in the Style tab

  7. If desired, change the properties of the icons in the Settings tab

  8. Click Done
